body_html: I'm surprised to see RandomUniform used in an inference graph. I believe you might need to set training=False when you create your model to get rid of ops like dropout that might use this, but I'm cc-ing @sguada since I'm hoping he might have some ideas on this?
body_text: I'm surprised to see RandomUniform used in an inference graph. I believe you might need to set training=False when you create your model to get rid of ops like dropout that might use this, but I'm cc-ing @sguada since I'm hoping he might have some ideas on this?
body: I'm surprised to see RandomUniform used in an inference graph. I believe you might need to set training=False when you create your model to get rid of ops like dropout that might use this, but I'm cc-ing @sguada since I'm hoping he might have some ideas on this?
